subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Justin Verlander (15-5) would have joined Nolan Ryan (seven), Sandy Koufax (four) and Bob Feller (three) as the only pitchers since 1900 with more than two no-hitters.
snippet: Justin Verlander (15-5) would have joined Nolan Ryan (seven), Sandy Koufax (four) and Bob Feller (three) as the only pitchers since 1900 with more than two no-hitters.
